casebody.data:
177 A.3d 128 LIEUTENANT JOHN KAMINSKAS AND CHIEF DANIEL VANISKA OF THE UNION COUNTY POLICE DEPARTMENT, APPELLANTS-PETITIONERS, v. STATE OF NEW JERSEY, DEPARTMENT OF LAW AND PUBLIC SAFETY, OFFICE OF THE ATTORNEY GENERAL, RESPONDENT-RESPONDENT.

C-426 September Term 2017

080128 December 13, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003528-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
